item.title: 美国商业设备订单创一年多来最大增幅
item.description: 11 月份，美国工厂的商业设备订单出现反弹，创下一年多来最强劲的月度增长。【原文：Orders placed with US factories for business equipment rebounded in November, posting the strongest monthly advance in over a year.】

item.title: 交易清淡，可可下跌，创纪录涨势引发获利回吐
item.description: 可可期货在纽约延续跌势，此前大涨促使交易商锁定涨幅。【原文：Cocoa futures extended declines in New York after a blistering rally prompted traders to lock in gains.】

item.title: 加拿大 11 月经济今年首次出现萎缩
item.description: 今年年底，即使加拿大央行快速降息，加拿大经济也似乎失去了动力。【原文：The Canadian economy appeared to lose its strength toward the end of this year even as the central bank cut interest rates at a rapid pace.】

item.title: 私人资产繁荣对经济的意义
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 微策略公司连续第七周购买更多比特币
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.）将于周一加入纳斯达克 100 指数，该公司宣布以接近上周最高纪录的均价增购了 5.61 亿美元的比特币。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc., which is set to enter the Nasdaq 100 Index on Monday, announced it had purchased an additional $561 million of Bitcoin at an average price near last week’s record high.】

item.title: Riot 耗资 2.5 亿美元在 Netflix 上推出的节目在电视上大受欢迎，在财务上却一败涂地
item.description:
'Arcane' 吸引了大量观众，但没有带来足够的游戏收入

。【原文：

‘Arcane’ drew a big audience, but didn’t bring in enough gaming revenue

】

item.title: 风险投资合伙人纷纷离开大公司
item.description:
深陷行业低迷的投资者通常会坚守数年，但现在他们正从工作岗位上退下来创办新公司— 或被排挤出公司 — 

。【原文：

Mired in an industry downturn, investors that usually stick around for years are stepping back from jobs to start new firms — or getting pushed out. 

】

item.title: 重塑公司债务规则的明星交易商
item.description: David Nemecek 和 Scott Greenberg 今年花了无数个小时，就垃圾评级公司债务文件中深埋的细枝末节展开争论。【原文：David Nemecek and Scott Greenberg spent countless hours across the table from each other this year, battling over the fine print buried deep in junk-rated companies’ debt documents.】

item.title: 据称大都会人寿接近达成收购香港大亨李嘉诚旗下松桥集团的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国保险公司大都会人寿（MetLife Inc.【原文：US insurer MetLife Inc. is nearing a deal to buy PineBridge Investments’ assets outside of China from Hong Kong billionaire Richard Li’s Pacific Century Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 微策略公司长期竞购 S&P 500 指数引发华尔街骚动
item.description: 对于迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的网络粉丝来说，这是加密货币正常化进程中的下一步：比特币代理公司微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.不管他们喜欢与否。【原文：To Michael Saylor’s online fanbase, it’s the next step in the great normalization of crypto: Bitcoin proxy MicroStrategy Inc. enters the S&P 500 next year, forcing the likes of index-tracking funds to buy his controversial company en masse. Whether they like it or not.】

item.title: 日本能源战略凸显人工智能对绿色目标的威胁
item.description:
大规模高耗能数据中心的快速推广危及向清洁燃料的过渡。【原文：

The rapid rollout of massive power-hungry data centers jeopardizes the transition to cleaner fuels.

】

item.title: 穆迪联合惠誉上调斯里兰卡债务重组评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）上调了斯里兰卡的信用评级，此前几天，斯里兰卡完成了美元债券的债务重组，从而降低了未来债券违约的风险。【原文：Moody’s Ratings upgraded Sri Lanka’s credit rating, days after the nation concluded debt restructuring of its dollar bonds, which reduces the risk of default on future notes.】

item.title: 炙手可热的肥胖症药物市场明年将让投资者目不暇接
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）试验性肥胖症注射剂的试验结果令人失望，这为投资者争夺制药业最热门市场的药物开发商们带来了不稳定的一年。【原文：Disappointing trial results for Novo Nordisk A/S’s experimental obesity shot capped a volatile year for investors in drug developers vying for a piece of pharma’s hottest market.】

item.title: 南非保留 2025 年美国市场优惠准入资格
item.description: 尽管两国关系紧张，南非仍将在 2025 年保留其商品进入美国市场的优惠准入。【原文：South Africa will retain its preferential access to the US markets for its goods in 2025 despite strained relations between the countries.】

item.title: 葡萄牙房价出现近两年来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于外国需求和市场上房屋短缺，葡萄牙第三季度的房地产价格创下了近两年来的最大涨幅。【原文：Property prices in Portugal rose the most in almost two years in the third quarter on the back of foreign demand and a shortage of homes on the market.】

item.title: 施乐公司同意以 15 亿美元收购打印机制造商利盟公司
item.description: 施乐公司已同意从一个亚洲投资者财团手中收购激光打印机制造商利盟国际公司（Lexmark International Inc.【原文：Xerox has agreed to buy the laser printer maker Lexmark International Inc. from a consortium of Asian investors in a deal valued at $1.5 billion.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀放缓低于预期，墨西哥银行降低利率
item.description: 由于墨西哥央行延长了降息期限，12 月初墨西哥年度通胀率的放缓幅度略低于预期。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation slowed slightly less than expected in early December as the central bank extends its interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 第二届特朗普白宫不会在针对科技的反垄断问题上退缩
item.description: 在为 2024 年划上句号的《科技日报》第一篇 "回顾过去，展望未来 "时事通讯中，我们将评估各大科技公司对即将上任的特朗普政府是否会有什么不同的期待。但首先...【原文：In the first of our look-back, look-ahead Tech Daily newsletters to cap off 2024, we assess whether major tech firms can expect anything different from the incoming Trump administration. But first...】

item.title: 特朗普挑起与巴拿马在运河船舶过境费问题上的争执
item.description: 巴拿马总统拒绝了唐纳德-特朗普关于美国重新控制巴拿马运河的威胁，并表示对该水道的主权不容谈判。【原文：Panama’s president rejected Donald Trump’s threat to reimpose US control over the Panama Canal, stating that sovereignty over the waterway is not negotiable.】

item.title: 新年为美国 "咆哮的 20 年代 "主题带来最大考验
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们将探讨美国的未来一年。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the US year ahead. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 巴西分析师认为通胀将加剧，2025 年关键利率将接近 15
item.description: 在央行行长们加强了将巨额加息延长至明年初的承诺之后，巴西的经济学家们上调了对 2025 年通货膨胀和借贷成本的预测。【原文：Brazil economists raised their forecasts for inflation and borrowing costs in 2025 after central bankers reinforced their commitment to extend jumbo interest rate hikes into early next year.】

item.title: Prosus 拟以 17 亿美元收购在线旅行社 Despegar
item.description: 互联网投资巨头 Prosus NV 将以 17 亿美元的价格收购拉丁美洲在线旅行社 Despegar.com Corp.【原文：Internet investing giant Prosus NV is acquiring Latin American online travel agency Despegar.com Corp. for $1.7 billion.】

item.title: 发现 2024 年蓬勃发展和衰退的市场
item.description: 在 2024 年结束之际，投资者要感谢唐纳德-特朗普的选举胜利和人工智能的发展。【原文：Investors are ending 2024 by giving thanks to Donald Trump's election victory and the advance of AI.】

item.title: 印度国营炼油厂努力争取俄罗斯原油供应
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度国营炼油厂发现很难买到所需数量的俄罗斯原油。【原文：India’s state oil refiners are finding it hard to buy the volume of Russian crude they need, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 30 年期房贷并非为应对气候混乱而设计
item.description:
随着摧毁房屋的天气越来越常见，越来越多的美国人将发现自己失去了安全网。【原文：

As house-demolishing weather becomes increasingly common, more Americans will find themselves without a safety net.

】

item.title: 挪威1.7万亿美元基金在美国增持物业
item.description: 挪威 1.7 万亿美元的主权财富基金斥资 9.768 亿美元，全资收购了美国三大城市的房产，加倍证实了其观点，即从长远来看，优质写字楼房地产仍然是一个不错的选择。【原文：Norway’s $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund paid $976.8 million to take full ownership of properties in three major US cities, doubling down on a view that prime office real estate remains a good bet in the longer term.】

item.title: 韩国计划 21 年来首次发行以韩元计价的外汇债券
item.description: 据一位直接了解该计划的财政部官员称，韩国计划在下个月发行二十多年来第一笔以韩元计价的外汇稳定债券。【原文：South Korea aims to issue its first won-denominated foreign-exchange stabilization debt in more than two decades next month, according to a finance ministry official with direct knowledge of the plan.】

item.title: 英国游戏执照审查三年来降幅最大的一次
item.description: 在英国博彩委员会开始审查在线博彩公司 Evolution AB 的运营情况后，该公司股价创下三年来最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of online gambling company Evolution AB fell the most in three years after the UK Gambling Commission opened a review of the firm’s operations.】

item.title: 受限的南非电网限制了绿色项目的授予
item.description: 南非将 1760 兆瓦的绿色电力项目授予了一些公司，作为减少电力对煤炭依赖的多年期计划的一部分。【原文：South Africa awarded 1,760 megawatts of green-power projects to companies as part of a multi-year program to cut its reliance on coal for electricity, with limited access to the country’s constrained transmission grid curbing its plans.】

item.title: 日本监管机构要求对前东京证券交易所工作人员进行内幕交易指控
item.description: 日本证券监察机构向检察官提交了一份控诉书，指控一名东京证券交易所前雇员及其父亲涉嫌内幕交易，这是震惊日本金融业的一系列丑闻中的最新一起。【原文：Japan’s securities watchdog filed a complaint to prosecutors against a former Tokyo Stock Exchange employee and his father for alleged insider trading, the latest in a slew of scandals that have rocked the nation’s financial industry.】
